posts.post_content:
Prices are shipped, net to me, and not necessarily firm. Not sure why the Cobb came back an A.

T206 Ty Cobb Red Portrait Polar Bear (SGC A): $OLD
T206 Sam Crawford Batting (PSA 3): N/A

Gonna keep the Crawford. It didn't sell, and I'm taking that as a sign that it belongs in my collection. Haha.

Cobb added. Thanks for looking! 

Heads up: I do leave on Sunday for my honeymoon, so I won't be very active next week.
